ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c, "Enterprise"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Type, "New Business-Enterprise Cloud"), ISCHANGED(Quantity), NOT(ISNEW()), OR( Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t0P000002EFL7QAO', Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t0P000002EFL8QAO', Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t0P000002EFL9QAO', Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01tU0000002q183IAA' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot change Quantity of Admin, Regular, Light users and Storage for Enterprise package.
